612296.detail_best:
When our side breaks the enemy's defense, 
increase the "Laceration pt" of the broken enemy by 1 point
then, if the "Laceration pt" of the broken enemy is 9 or higher and the enemy is not in a Severe Injury state,
apply the Special Effect "Severe Injury" to the enemy (treated as a Battle Skill)
but the "Laceration pt" will reset to 1<sidenote>
Laceration pt: Effect details are recorded in Basic Abilities
Severe Injury: Causes bleeding effects to deal 20 times the damage,
and increases the power of attacks received by 15% (exceptions apply / effects of the same type cannot stack)

612309.detail_best:
When our side breaks the enemy's defense, 
increase the "Laceration pt" of the broken enemy by 1 point
and restore 3 BP to Esmeralda
then, if the "Laceration pt" of the broken enemy is 9 or higher and the enemy is not in a Severe Injury state,
apply the Special Effect "Severe Injury" to the enemy (treated as a Battle Skill)
but the "Laceration pt" will reset to 1
â€»If the member of our side who caused the defense break is Incapacitated, the restoration effect will not activate<sidenote>
Laceration pt: Effect details are recorded in Basic Abilities
Severe Injury: Causes bleeding effects to deal 20 times the damage,
and increases the power of attacks received by 15% (exceptions apply / effects of the same type cannot stack)

612314.detail_best:
Deal <skl_calc_type> <skl_attribute_name> damage to <skl_target_type> (potency: <skl_avail_value>)
and increase "Laceration pt" by 2
If the target is in a bleeding state, potency is multiplied by 1.2
Afterward, if the target's "Laceration pt" is 9 or higher and not in a critical state,
grant Special Effect "Critical Injury"
but "Laceration pt" will reset to 1<sidenote>
Laceration pt: Effect described in Basic Skills
Critical Injury: Bleeding effect damage becomes 20 times greater,
and received attack potency increases by 15% (some exceptions / effects of the same type cannot stack)
